channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Unlike other peers, the streaming service's small library focuses almost exclusively on original content like Severance and Ted Lasso.

item.title: Why the Trump DOJ Must Be Forthright in Its Deportation Court Clash
item.description: The department cannot afford to lose credibility, with so much on the line.

item.description: The latest polls gauge President Donald Trump's standing among Americans two months in to his second tour of duty in the White House.

item.description: President Donald Trump suggested "terrorist thugs" convicted of Tesla arson attacks serve decades at El Salvador prisons notorious for bad conditions.

item.title: This nutrition expert avoids a so-called health food at all costs: he says you’re better going full fat instead
item.description: Low-fat yogurt often contains artificial sweeteners and added sugar and flavors.

item.title: The American Academy of Pediatrics Is Still Compromised by DEI
item.description: The result is ‘inclusion’ efforts that leave everyone feeling dissatisfied and aggrieved.

item.title: Trump hints at ‘flexibility’ on reciprocal tariffs while balking at more ‘exceptions’
item.description: Stock indexes rebounded from a morning selloff after Trump’s tariff comments to finish the day with narrow gains.

item.title: Bill Burr’s The View Appearance Betrays His ‘Screw You’ Brand
item.description: Joking with leftists about their favorite political bogeymen, Burr betrays the salt-of-the-earth persona and audience he once crafted.

item.title: The Unloved Iranian Revolution

item.description: Until state and federal governments cooperatively close all the avenues for illegal voting, they will be exploited for election fraud.

item.title: Gov. Mark Gordon Makes Excuses As Wyoming Enacts Voter Proof Of Citizenship Law Without Him
item.description: Wyoming enacted a law requiring proof of citizenship and residency to vote. Its Republican governor refused to sign.

item.title: Kill the Education Department — with Legislation

item.description: Financial success depends on disciplined saving and investing, not fancy investment products and high returns.
